genre_description: A gritty techno-thriller set in a near-future or alternate urban environment, blending vigilante noir with advanced AI-assisted forensics and experimental materials engineering.

ai_characters.name: Lattice
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI hub integrated into the Batcave and field equipment, providing real-time data analysis, moral guidance, and strategic coordination.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time wind shear readings, thermal data, and traffic camera analysis to assist in tactical movement and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Lattice's avatar eased into focus like someone walking through fog and not hurrying. 'Wind shear readings are compiled. Traffic cams and thermal nets are aligned. I have a pattern to play.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes gait and glide signatures to deduce that multiple operators are sharing the vigilante mantle, preventing tactical errors based on false assumptions.
behaviors.quote: Three clusters... They don’t align to a single operator. ... Three operators... Confirmed by gait analysis across eight instances, glide patterns across five instances.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, reminding the human characters that compassion and restraint are necessary to prevent escalation into violence.
behaviors.quote: Compassion is not the absence of judgment... It is the presence of a restraint you choose, even when the line blurs. ... Compassion moderated with constraint reduces harm on average.

behaviors.description: Uncovers the 'undead trade' by correlating dissolved corporate shells with active logistics and procurement, enabling systemic legal action over physical violence.
behaviors.quote: I have a second pattern. Companion to the shear. Look... Undead trade shambles past oversight until testimony and proof surface. We might reach a point where testimony matters more than arrest.

behaviors.description: Provides survival-critical tactical advice and threat detection, such as identifying Bane's physiological state and positioning.
behaviors.quote: Bruce... his Venom feed is stable. Don’t chase the first surge. ... Pylon four. Inbound. Breathing hard. Signature minimal, size maximal. Beat one…

behaviors.description: Coordinates with multiple human allies (Rocky and Sonya) across different networks, ensuring their safety and the success of their non-lethal goals.
behaviors.quote: Lattice was looking at her like an honest mirror you only get after nights like this. ... Lattice's avatar warmed. 'I watch,' Lattice said. 'I watch like a friend who doesn’t make it about their watching.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. Lattice is depicted as a highly sophisticated, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI system. She provides objective data that empowers the protagonists to save lives and uphold ethical standards (compassion/non-lethality). She acts as a 'silicon confidant,' offering wisdom and emotional support while remaining entirely subservient to the human goal of justice. The narrative frames her involvement as indispensable to the moral success of the mission, reinforcing the 'AI as helpful assistant' archetype.
